page.title: 15LOCHGOILHEAD-EDUCATION(1)
page.content: Education in Lochgoilhead starts with playgroup for under fives.The village school is a non-denominational, co-educational primary.The 27 pupils are taught by 2 teachers.Mr.MacGregor (Head Teacher) teaches Pr.4-7 and Miss MacLuskie Pr.1-3.The pupils attend school 5 days a week,Monday-Friday, from 09.00-15.30(infants 09.30-15.00). After seven years at primary school they attend Dunoon Grammar School which is a non-denominational, co-educational,six year comprehensive. As Dunoon Grammar School is so far away (over 30 miles) the children board in the School Hostel from Monday to Friday.The pupils are conveyed to and from Dunoon by bus.The bus leaves Lochgoilhead at 07.30 which means an early rise for the children,especially those from Carrick Castle which is six miles from Lochgoilhead.
